backend/main.mo: Defines salon, booking, user profile types, initializes maps and mixins, and seeds default Swiss salons if none exist.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining light/dark OKLCH variables and global resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint mounting the root div and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps and returns the AppV1 component as the main app export.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Large React component implementing V1 UI with salon cards, search, filters, and booking interactions.
frontend/src/components/AuthHeader.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the AuthHeader component.
Empty placeholder for a salon creation form component.
frontend/src/components/MemberCard.tsx: Empty placeholder for a loyalty member card component.
frontend/src/components/MonopolyModeSwit: Empty placeholder for a monopoly mode toggle component.
frontend/src/components/MotionButton.tsx: Empty placeholder for a MotionButton wrapper component.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBadge.tsx: Empty placeholder for a premium badge component.
frontend/src/components/Pressable.tsx: Empty placeholder for a pressable interaction wrapper.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder for a profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/ProSalonWizard.t: Empty placeholder for a multi-step salon creation wizard.
frontend/src/components/ProStudioCreator: Empty placeholder for a pro studio creation component.
frontend/src/components/RevenueChart.tsx: Empty placeholder for a revenue chart component.
frontend/src/components/SalonListSection: Empty placeholder for a salon list display section.
frontend/src/components/VipDashboard.tsx: Empty placeholder for a VIP dashboard component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity provider and hook with login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder for React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalonImage.ts: Empty placeholder for hooks handling salon image logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark mode, scrollbar utilities, safe-area padding, keyframe animations, and animation utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboardPage.t: Empty page placeholder for the client dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for the login screen.
frontend/src/pages/ProDashboardPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for the professional dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/SalonDetailsPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for salon details view.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Generates marketing text for salons based on category, type, tags, and location using predefined phrases.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Empty utility file for currency-related helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, plugins, and content paths using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, architectural notes, and known issues for ongoing development resets and UX changes.
